title: Medallion, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: embroidered in satin and knot stitches
description: Embroidery in satin and knot stitches showing a young man in a garden. Portions of the ground silk not covered by embroidery have been cut away.

tombstone.epitaph:
Medallion, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: embroidered in satin and knot stitches. Bequest of Erskine Hewitt. 1938-57-1630.
